tuv.seg: To start using OmegaT, first create a project that will hold all your files, such as your source file, translation memories, glossaries, and eventually your translated file.
Pro cumintzare a impreare OmegaT, crea in antis unu progetu chi cuntèngiat totu is archìvios, che a s'archìviu de orìgine, memòrias de tradutzione, glossàrios e mancari s'archìviu tradùidu.
